timeline.bodyText: Can you add the attribute name and the invalid value to the error message?
timeline.author: mvocu

replies.bodyText: I think both the name and the value are already in the message because the final error message is created from given attribute, facility and message like this: attribute.toString() + " Set for: " + attributeHolder + " - " + message...
replies.author: metodej
